entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
